content: That's really helpful! I didn't know that turmeric and neem could be beneficial for Indian skin. I'll definitely look into products that incorporate those ingredients. And I've heard great things about La Roche-Posay's sunscreens, so I might give those a try too. By the way, have you come across any skincare products that cater specifically to mixed-heritage skin tones, like mine or the woman I met at the cultural festival who was half Korean and half Mexican?
